Uses of Interface
bits.IProblem

    • Uses of IProblem in bits

      Classes in bits that implement IProblem 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlternativeDenial
      An extension of the Problem class which expresses the alternative denial (also called the NAND or Sheffer stroke) of several given IProblems.
      class  BitAnder
      An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
      class  BitArrayPartition
      For example, suppose partition is as follows:
      class  BitArraySingleClearer
      For any positive integer n, if X_0, X_1, X_2, ...
      class  BitArraySingleSetter
      For any positive integer n, if X_0, X_1, X_2, ...
      class  BitEqualityIndicator
      An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
      class  BitEqualizer
      An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on two IBooleanVariables.
      class  BitExclusiveSelector
      An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
      class  BitFixer
      An extension of the Problem class which implements a Boolean constraint.
      class  BitInequalityIndicator
      An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
      class  BitNander
      An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
      class  BitNoter
      An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on two IBooleanVariables.
      class  BitOrderer
      An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on two IBooleanVariables.
      class  BitOrer
      An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
      class  BitShefferStroker
      An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on two IBooleanVariables.
      class  BitUnequalizer
      An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on two IBooleanVariables.
      class  BitXnorer
      An extension of the Problem class which implements a Boolean function.
      class  BitXorer
      An extension of the Problem class which implements a Boolean function.
      class  ClauseDenier
      An extension of the Problem class which expresses the denial of a given IClause.
      class  ConditionalConjunction
      Returns an IProblem that is satisfied if and only if all of the following IProblems are satisfied:
      class  ConditionalDisjunction
      Returns an IProblem that is satisfied if and only if at least one of the following IProblems is satisfied:
      class  Conjunction
      An extension of the Problem class which creates a new IProblem object from a collection of IProblem objects that will be satisfied if and only if all of the original IProblems are satisfied.
      class  Disjunction
      Returns an IProblem that is satisfied if and only at least one of the IProblems passed to it as parameters is satisfied.
      class  ExclusiveDisjunction
      An extension of the Problem class which expresses the exclusive disjunction of two given IProblems.
      class  FredkinGater
      An extension of the Problem class which implements a Fredkin gate.
      class  Problem
      A class which represents a collection of IClause objects, and which amounts to a satisfiability problem.
      class  ProblemBitLinker
      This class links the value of an IBooleanVariable to the truth value of a given IProblem.
      class  ProblemDenier
      An extension of the Problem class which expresses the denial of a given IProblem.
      class  ProblemDifferencer
      An extension of the Problem class which expresses the logical difference of two given IProblems.
      class  ThreeBitAdder
      An extension of the IProblem class which performs an add with carry of three BooleanVariables.
      class  ToffoliGater
      An extension of the Problem class which implements a Toffoli gate.
      class  TwoBitAdder
      An extension of the IProblem class which performs an add with carry of two BooleanVariables.
